ovdesc.p: EB.AUTHSERVER.CONFIG is an application holding details about configurations which will be sent to EXTERNAL AUTHENTICATION SERVER

desc.p: This field should contain field names from the above table that need to be supplied to an external authentication server.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field should contain the name of the table from which fields should be taken (e.g. CUSTOMER) and passed to an external authentication server
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
